content.original: Rotary PPC: Experimental downsized PPC with select-fire of 1-8 shots.
content.prevOriginal: Rotary PPC: Experimental downsized PPC with select-fire of 1-8 shots.
content.content: 转轮粒子炮:实验型缩小粒子炮,每次射击可以根据选择发射1-8次.

content.original: Allows picking up both friendly and enemy units. Enemy units will take damage when dropped.
content.prevOriginal: Allows picking up both friendly and enemy units. Enemy units will take damage when dropped.
content.content: 允许拾取友方和敌方单位.敌方单位在掉落时会受到伤害.

content.original: Artillery Mode: May fire at any hex or ground unit in range. -7 Accuracy.
content.prevOriginal: Artillery Mode: May fire at any hex or ground unit in range. -7 Accuracy.
content.content: 炮兵模式:可以向射程内的任何格子或地面单位开火,-7精度.

content.original: Carronade battery: Can fire {0} to {1} shots in barrage. Each shot after the first has a {2} chance of missfire.
content.prevOriginal: Carronade battery: Can fire {0} to {1} shots in barrage. Each shot after the first has a {2} chance of missfire.
content.content: '臼炮'炮组:可以发射{0}到{1}次弹幕.第一次开火后的每一次开火都有{2}机率哑火.

content.original: Jumbo Machine guns can be set to fire between 1 and 5 shots or shotgun mode, but have recoil and can jam.
content.prevOriginal: Jumbo Machine guns can be set to fire between 1 and 5 shots or shotgun mode, but have recoil and can jam.
content.content: 巨型机枪(MG)能被设置一次发射1-5发弹药或霰弹模式,但是有后座并且可能卡壳.

content.original: Can fire in Shotgun Mode, firing a large amount of shots together, but is garantueed to jam.
content.prevOriginal: Can fire in Shotgun Mode, firing a large amount of shots together, but is garantueed to jam.
content.content: 可以在霰弹模式下开火,一次发射大量的子弹,但容易卡壳.
备选开火模式会造成哑火
